message: Recycle one of his rockets shot in the sea and the next time he launches one drop the recycled N.Korea rocket on downtown PingPong with writing on the side in Korean that says stop littering the oceans .

Not kowing the Elf story, I accidentley touched my Grandsons' Elf. Ben, the oldest at age 7 got upset and I apologized profusely. His Mom was there and told Ben it was just a slight touch and it should be ok. Thank goodness he accepted that! I felt soooo bad.

Jessica Coleman-it was NOT aimed at you, so don't take it so personally & I WAS NOT calling this dad a narcissist, so I was not presuming anything actually. It was a general statement about anyone who feels the need to constantly video tape themselves doing anything & putting it out there for everyone, that's called narcissism, look it up. It wasn't directed at one person.
